name: Mr. Grand Pumpkin
description:
Mr. Crand Pumpkin  ( The candy addict)

Halloween is nearly here, and Mr. Grand Pumkin has not been able to grow his full powers to take over the world! He only has his head to bounce around to collect some halloween candy, which give him power to show what he is made of.

You have to help him to collect just enough candy and only then he can fulfill his destiny as the Grand Pumpkin!

..nourish his addiction!

(The game is part of Finnish College Game Jam fall 2022 - Dev time 4 Days)

---

Programming/Sound Design
SirHenry

2d Art/Animation
Heebuli

2d Art/Animation

(Download the Zip file below and unpack it to your computer to play)

(All soundFX/Music are from Unity Asset Store)
